Articles.Content:
Hello there. I was, and I still am, going to use this Tank for a short movie I had decided to make. And for some reason, I decided to make the tank prop fully functional. So thats why I present to you; The K1A1 Kabrahams! Straight out of Jebediah's testing facility!

CONTENTS:

Two Landing legs acting like a bipod

Eight wheels

Four rechargable batteries

Two functional ladders and one useless one

Six solar panels

Six Lazor guided missiles

Three seats

Instructions on how to use it:

Note: If there are none kerbals inside the tank, it will drive with inverted controls!!!

1. Load it up.

2. Drive it to somewhere on the grass

3. Extend the first ladder on the rear of the tank (NB: The second ladder is useless, you'll have to jump up the side!!!)

4. Drive a transport vehicle up to the tank (Up to three kerbals)

5. Board the tank with the kerbals

6. Drive away

------------------------------

How to shoot:

1. Find a nice spot to stop on

2. Deploy the bipod (Landing Legs)

3. Activate the lazor system, and target the enemies

4. Press the stage button

Download:

http://www./download/1gvai4rgwvujuc4/K1A1_Kabrahams.craft

Required mods:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lazor-system/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lazor-guided-weapons/

And have a nice day.
excellent design.. now all we need is a "Stryker" version for the kerbal marines....
Indeed we do. Indeed we do...

Wow, that things pretty nice, ive never thought about using weapons on land based vehicles. Now for the real challenge, moon tanks.

Edited July 19, 2013 by shoveycat
